content:
Sure, here are some vegan-friendly filling options for tacos:

1. Spicy black beans
2. Grilled portobello mushrooms
3. Roasted sweet potato or yams
4. Chickpeas cooked with taco seasoning
5. Sauteed or grilled vegetables like onions, bell peppers, and zucchini
6. Refried beans made with vegetable broth instead of lard
7. Tofu scramble with taco seasoning and veggies
8. Vegan meat substitutes like soy chorizo or crumbled tempeh. 9. Guacamole, salsa, and pico de gallo
10. Vegan cheese and sour cream substitutes. These are just a few of the many vegan-friendly options available for filling tacos. You can mix and match different options to create your own unique taco creations.
